# **About me...**

I'm broadly interested in statistical/spatial ecology and wildlife conservation. I'm currently working on mammal abundance and distribution modeling to improve wildlife management, focusing on human-animal interactions and monitoring programs design. I mostly use Bayesian inference in combination with cartographic tools.
